Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I've had a quick search for anything on this but no luck - apologies if I've missed something!

I used to play a good time back on an ancient laptop - and have finally (about 3 years!) got round to getting a new laptop - huzzah! So I've downloaded the demo (which looks very shiny) ready to go and now having issues. :-(

Have downloaded for Windows, and extracted the ZIP file into C/Program Files/KSP.

Game seems to start fine, I can go into settings etc. However, when I go to start a game, regardless of whether I choose Sandbox or Career nothing seems to happen at all... The menus disapear and the animation of the Mun seems to keep going in the background but no rockets, or kerbals in sight

Many thanks in advance...

Broom

C:\Program Files\ is a directory which is specially protected by Windows. This causes problems to a lot of programs.

Please move the game out of the special folders like Program Files, Users, Windows, etc.
